name: Delivery
description:
You were created to bring happiness to people.

After a simple education, you prepared to step out into the world.

But the world was different from what you had envisioned.

You wake up in a misty place devoid of any living soul.



Unique and challenging physics puzzle:

Most of this game consists of puzzles using the character’s body and nearby objects.
It requires both thinking and control ability.

It won’t be easy.



Mysterious and dark atmosphere:

Explore the misty and silent town.
There is no kind explanation or story.
Just imagine.
